>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.YMGOKoZtKgJqIsAD]{Mechanic Trick}

Your custom rig can exercise delicate control over your vehicle, which gains an autopilot function (Core Rulebook 280) with a Piloting bonus equal to 4 + 1-1/2 the vehicleâ€™s item level. You can use your custom rig control the autopilot at a range of 500 feet, allowing you to engage, disengage, or enter coordinates for the autopilot as if you were in the vehicle. This range increases to 5 miles if you have the expert rig ability, 50 miles if you have the advanced rig ability, and has a planetary range if you have the superior rig ability.

You must have the experimental vehicle class feature to choose this trick.
